reviews.review_msg: Does not believe in posting notes or extra examples. She reads straight from the book and does not lecture. Her tests are brutal and the class average typically hovers around 70%. She also did not fully cover the curriculum we paid for, she started Chapter 8 on Wednesday of week 10. Get ready to read and study hard.

Probably the worst proffessor I've ever had. Barely goes over examples in lectures and only reads from the textbook. Tests are worth 70 percent of your entire grade and the review problem she gives for them sometimes don't even relate to the actual exam problems. I would recommend getting a tutor because she is incompetent in teaching.

There are two mid-terms in this class both worth 20% of your grade and a final worth 30% of your grade. You can go to lectures, but she literally teaches straight out of the textbook, copying it word for word. When she tries to explain it, it's all very confusing so you are basically stuck with teaching YouTube videos and online resources.
Do not take. Please listen to this plea.
